House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00275
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A REVISED APPRENTICESHIP PROGRAM REPEALING FOR THE PURPOSE CHAPTERS I AND II OF TITLE II OF PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 442, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LABOR CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : Aims to further reforms in apprenticeship program and provide the youth with skills and access to employment to ensure a continuous supply of skilled workers to increase productivity and competitiveness of enterprises.
ALIAS NAME : “Revised Apprenticeship Program Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : AGLIPAY, MICHAEL EDGAR Y.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT ON 2019-07-23
